role.argrole: entity arg0 waits for and stops

example.parse: (IP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 要) (VP (VV 采访) (NP-OBJ (PN 他))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 只)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (PP-LOC (P 在) (LCP (NP (NN 党部)) (LCP (NP (NN 门)) (LC 口)))) (VP (VV 堵) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (PN 他)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 车))))))))
